#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n,i,a,j,count;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>a;
		count=0;
		for(i=1;;i++)
		{
			j=i;
			count++;
			while(j>=1)
			{
				if(j%10==a){count--;break;}
				j=j/10;
			}
			if(count==n)break;
		}
		cout<<i<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
